channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15875] Remove HTable references and HTableInterface
item.description:
I want to add a new AsyncTable implementation and to do that with great quality I want to run all the tests with a sync Table implementation which uses the AsyncTable within. To do this the HbaseTestingUtility has to return Table instead of HTable.

I saw this as the ideal opportunity to remove all deprecated HTableInterface methods in 2.0 branch and thus the interface itself. This means all auto flush settings are removed.

Some discussion points:

  • I had to remove doBulkLoad(Path hfofDir, final HTable table) from LoadIncrementalHFiles because of the hard HTable usage and replaced usages to the other doBulkLoad(Path hfofDir, final Admin admin, Table table, RegionLocator regionLocator) method.
  • HBaseTestingUtility now returns Table instead of HTable
  • I removed all the methods from HConnection that were also in Connection + I removed the getTable methods which should not be used anymore. (HConnection is deprecated so could be removed itself)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
• Let HBaseTestingUtility return Table instead of HTable
  • Remove HTableInterface and usage
  • Remove HTable as much as possible
  • Remove auto flush settings
  • Clean up HConnection a bit

In my next patch related to the async Table work I will drop in a new AsyncTable (without scan support) and a drop in replacement for the HTable which uses the AsyncTable within. Depending on its performance whole HTable can be dropped.

-1 overall

Would it help if we did HBASE-15610 first Jurriaan Mous? (Looking at the patch, it doesn't look necessary... can be done afterward).

I opened HBASE-15876 to manage the removal of doBulkLoad. It is problematic removing this method from a public, stable class (though it a damaged method with its reference to a deprecated param).

Removal of autoflush needs flagging in release notes here as incompatible (allowed) change.

This patch is great.
Removed code which landed in HBASE-15610 and HBASE-15876

What is causing the license error? It is something with the excludes but I can't see anything wrong. I added no new files so I think I did not make a mistake with the licenses..

It can be found in this file when searching on "excludes":
https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2054/artifact/patchprocess/patch-asflicense.txt

Appy Is it possible that we are dropping an 'excludes' in the top level of a build? See the report here: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2054/artifact/patchprocess/patch-asflicense-problems.txt
Pushed to master branch. The 'excludes' complaint by license is unrelated. Thanks for the very nice patch Jurriaan Mous
We download the excludes file from HBase-Find-Flaky-Tests job to exclude the flaky tests. Let me put up simple patch to delete it so that we don't see this issue.
